DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effect teriparatide vascular ( blood vessel ) compliance osteoprotegerin ( bone fluid ) RANKL level ( bone cell ) .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Therapy With Teriparatide Vascular Compliance Osteoprotegerin/RANKL
DOC.detailed_description: Research subject participation 6 month . Subjects give daily injection teriparatide instruction technique .
DOC.criteria: Postmenopausal woman men age 40 start therapy teriparatide Patients diabetes mellitus current smoker patient history organ transplantation Patients currently previously glucocorticoid therapy within past year Patients serum creatinine 1.5 mg/dl , patient uncontrolled hypertension ( BP 140/90 great ) Patients ineligible teriparatide therapy : History metabolic bone disease osteoporosis History radiation therapy Patients pregnant nursing History bone metastasis skeletal malignancy History hypercalcemia
